participant_2.background:
I decided to follow my dream and started my own ice cream business.
i am a geology major at alabama university.
its important for my instagram posts to look like i am having fun.
I am an only child, so I have to make my own fun.
I like to eat at the local diner after a long day of hiking with my horses.

content.text: I'm a big fan of your ice cream business.
Thanks so much, Sarah! It's been a lot of work, but it's been really rewarding.
What made you decide to start your own business?
I've always loved making ice cream, and I thought it would be a fun way to make a living.
That's great! I'm sure you're really good at it.
What's your favorite flavor of ice cream to make?
I have a few favorites, but I think my favorite is probably the chocolate chip cookie dough.
That sounds delicious! I'll have to try it sometime.
You should! It's one of our most popular flavors.
I'm sure it is. It sounds like you're doing really well with your business.
Thanks, I'm really happy with how it's going so far.
Thanks for chatting with me, Sarah!
No problem, Jessica. It was nice talking to you.
